name: TradeOff - Stock Trading Game
description:
Whether you are new to the stock market, a casual trader who wants to get better, or looking for a supportive trading community, TradeOff has an experience for you.

Built by award-winning traders, TradeOff combines a Financial Education app, a Stock Market training tool, and a Trading Skill game - with real-world prizes!

LEARN
TradeOff will show you that you CAN learn Strategies to make money in the markets, and win our Trading Events. From the basics of buying and selling to more advanced topics like using Trading Indicators to predict price direction, momentum, and other patterns which help you make Profitable Trading decisions.

PRACTICE
TradeOff games speed-stream real, historical market data, giving you an authentic trading experience. Players use the app to hone their skills and develop their understanding of the markets - accelerating learning towards profitable trading.

WIN
TradeOff offers fast, daily Trading Competitions where players from around the world try to trade for the highest profits and win valuable prizes. Play for free, win tokens and use these tokens to enter Prize events!
